alert.note: Alert for Cass; St. Joseph (Michigan) Issued by the National Weather Service

info.senderName: NWS NorthernIndiana (Northern Indiana and Northeastern Ohio)
info.headline: Special Weather Statement issued July 28 at 6:58AM EDT by NWS NorthernIndiana
info.description: ...STRONG THUNDERSTORMS WILL IMPACT ELKHART...WESTERN NOBLE... KOSCIUSKO...NORTHEASTERN CASS...LAGRANGE...NORTHWESTERN STEUBEN... SOUTHEASTERN ST. JOSEPH...FULTON...PULASKI...NORTHWESTERN MIAMI... STARKE...MARSHALL...SOUTHEASTERN CASS AND SOUTHERN ST. JOSEPH COUNTIES THROUGH 800 AM EDT/700 AM CDT/... At 658 AM EDT/558 AM CDT/, Doppler radar was tracking strong thunderstorms along a line extending from near Bristol to Medaryville. Movement was east at 40 mph. HAZARD...Wind gusts of 50 to 55 mph. SOURCE...Radar indicated. IMPACT...Gusty winds could knock down tree limbs and blow around unsecured objects. This includes the following highways... Interstate 69 in Indiana between mile markers 356 and 357. Interstate 80 in Indiana between mile markers 92 and 144. MAX HAIL SIZE...0.00 IN MAX WIND GUST...55 MPH
info.instruction: If outdoors, consider seeking shelter inside a building.
